document_data.caption: A map of the Dragonjaw Mountains
document_data.name: Dragonjaw Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragonjaw Mountains''' were mountains in [[Thesk]] inhabited by [[gnome]]s and [[copper dragon]]s. The gnomes were frequent visitors to the human city of [[Milvarune]] where they traded their crafts. The dragons were known to enter annual joke-telling competitions with the gnomes.
